name: Garlic-Butter Roasted Mushrooms
author: France C
summary: Transform bland mushrooms into a flavorful side dish to accompany your favorite protein. My favorite way to serve these is with a juicy grilled ribeye.
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Clean mushrooms with a damp paper towel and gently remove and discard stems
Drizzle oil into a large cast iron skillet to evenly coat
Place mushrooms into the skillet, cap-side down
Carefully sprinkle garlic into the mushroom cavities, taking care not to sprinkle directly into the skillet
Drizzle mushrooms with melted butter, then season with salt and pepper
Roast in the preheated oven for 15 minutes
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and return to the oven for 3 to 5 more minutes
Remove from the oven and sprinkle with parsley
